name: Dear wisp.
description:
I'm in the midst of experimenting with this platform and I am happy to announce that this is the first of many physical drawings (mixed with poems) that I'm gonna mint, at long may come some digital illustrations. Enjoy this piece called "Dear wisp" and, if you can't manage to understand my awful handwriting, I'll type the poem down here:

"Dear wisp, kiss my lips
I'll let you lick the blood that drips

Honey, tastes like honey;
Your light from within.
I've been so sour,
it'll be my sin.

Wisp of love, you are my gift.
Love and smoke, that's all I need."
